title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 § 2.53 - Vehicles-item 21p
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 § 2.53 - Vehicles-item 21p

State Regulations
(a) All vehicles
used for transportation of pasteurized milk and milk products shall be
constructed and operated so that the milk and milk products are maintained at
45° F (7° C) or less, and are protected from sun, from freezing and from
contamination. (b) This item is
deemed to be satisfied when: (1)

All vehicles
are kept clean. (2)

Material which
is capable of contaminating milk or milk products is not transported with milk
or milk products. (3)

Vehicles have
fully enclosed bodies with well-fitted solid doors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§
2.53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
